text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: *pant* *pant* Alright, I'm done running!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: What's next, Trainer? Come on, give me orders!
My training with Vodka, who was more honest than I had imagined, was proceeding very smoothly.
A large stretcher, a body that gives off a strong feeling of flexibility―― With enough potential, it looks like I'll have high hopes for the future.
choice_data_list: Let's just level up the menu.
Let's raise the level of the menu a little.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh! That's good, come on. I'll do it cool!
And one day――

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh, crap. I haven't submitted an application for the event yet. I need to fill it out and submit it…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? You don't know? Oh, right, you haven't held it since you came to Academy.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Twice a year, it's a major event within Trecen Academy. Every student registers for their favorite event and races.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: We've got a lot of customers from outside the Academy, so we're gonna have a blast!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Also, this is a rare opportunity for us to have a real fight with those strong guys who have already made their debut.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: If you apply for the same event and you're assigned to the same group, you'll be able to run before and after your debut!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Ugh, I'm really looking forward to this! I've gotta show them how cool I am!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Ah, that's right, Trainer! Let's go eat something good outside to cheer up!
choice_data_list:
All right, here's your reward 
for always working so hard!

Alright, here's your reward 
for always working so hard!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh, you don't get it! Then let's go right away! I'll go get changed, so wait a minute!
And so, Vodka and I went out to eat.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Phew, I ate, I ate! I have to be careful about my weight, but this is nice every once in a while!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Oh? Oh?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Wh-What's with that cool poster?!
Vodka followed her gaze, which had been glued to it, and saw a poster of a horsegirl riding a large motorcycle.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Heh, a movie, huh…? So such a cool bike is coming out……heeeeh……!!
choice_data_list: Why don't we go see it?
Why don't we go see it?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Really?! Really?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …………Yaaaaaaay! That was so cool!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Did you see the bike chase at the climax!? When it was curved, my body was stretched across the ground!!
choice_data_list: I didn't know you liked motorcycles that much.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? But it's cool!! Like that heavy engine sound, or that glaring body!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: My dad's got a big bike like that, too. She used to ride behind me a lot when I was little.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It's so nice, isn't it? A bike! How do I put this? …Yeah, it's so romantic!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Come to think of it, when I first went to see Derby, she used to ride my dad's bike.
choice_data_list: Did your father let you meet the race?
Your father let you meet the race.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, my dad loves racing! She said 'Woof, there's only cool guys over there.'

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: When I first heard it, I thought I didn't really know. But when I saw the race…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …The moment I opened the gate, I was so excited.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I don't even remember blinking until the match. Seriously, it wasn't amazing……!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: 『I won't let you win!』 『Open the front door!』 『First place is yours!』 All of them were giving off that kind of aura……!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: On the way home, Dad was always yelling 'Hey, you're so cool!', but she seemed really happy as she drove her bike.
choice_data_list: That's why you decided to race.
That's why I decided to race.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Yeah. I run as coolly as those guys I saw back then!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Heheh, I'm really pumped. I'm glad I watched the movie! Thanks for inviting me, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Ah, but, before the climax… l-love scenes?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, well, how do I put this…? Well, I guess I'll have to give up.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I prefer stiffer ones. Such soft ones… ki, ki… scenes……

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: D-Don't be so blunt!! Ahhhh, I'm starting to remember…!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Ngah?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: My nose is bleeding…
…The day after that pleasant outing.
As I was training with Vodka as usual…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Oh, Vodka! It's about the event… You're in the 10th group of 2000 meters of grass, right?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Me? But… what?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: No, I'm just wondering if it's okay if I don't have to change my application… It looks like they'll still accept it now.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Change? Why do I have to do that?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Why…? Don't tell me you haven't seen the flight manifest!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: That Naritabrian is in the same group!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Am I… in the same race as Brian?!
